databaseObjects.objectNames: salaries2, test_1, table_1, xyz, table_abc, uritype_test, sales, test_4, test_8, table_xyz, test_7, anydata_test, anytype_test, test_2, test_non_pk_multi_column_list, test_5, test_6, test_interval, anydataset_test, test_3, test_9, newtable, table_test

databaseObjects.details: There are some gin indexes present in the schema, but gin indexes are partially supported in YugabyteDB as mentioned in (https://github.com/yugabyte/yugabyte-db/issues/7850) so take a look and modify them if not supported.

issues.reason: CREATE SCHEMA with elements not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement:
CREATE SCHEMA hollywood
    CREATE TABLE films (title text, release date, awards text[])
    CREATE VIEW winners AS
        SELECT title, release FROM films WHERE awards IS NOT NULL;

issues.reason: DROP multiple objects not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement: DROP COLLATION IF EXISTS coll1,coll2,coll3;
issues.suggestion: DROP COLLATION coll1;DROP COLLATION coll2;DROP COLLATION coll3;

issues.reason: ALTER TYPE not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement: ALTER TYPE colors ADD VALUE 'orange' AFTER 'red';

issues.reason: ALTER TYPE not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement: ALTER TYPE compfoo ADD ATTRIBUTE f3 int;

issues.reason: DROP multiple objects not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement: DROP SEQUENCE seq1_tbl,seq2_tbl,seq3_tbl;
issues.suggestion: DROP SEQUENCE seq1_tbl;DROP SEQUENCE seq2_tbl;DROP SEQUENCE seq3_tbl;

issues.reason: CREATE CONVERSION not supported yet
issues.sqlStatement: CREATE CONVERSION myconv FOR 'UTF8' TO 'LATIN1' FROM myfunc;

issues.reason: ALTER CONVERSION not supported yet
issues.sqlStatement: ALTER CONVERSION myconv for  'UTF8' TO 'LATIN1' FROM myfunc1;

issues.reason: Issue with Partition using Expression on a table which cannot contain Primary Key / Unique Key on any column
issues.sqlStatement:
CREATE TABLE salaries2 (
	emp_no bigint NOT NULL,
	salary bigint NOT NULL,
	from_date timestamp NOT NULL,
	to_date timestamp NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY (emp_no,from_date)
) PARTITION BY RANGE (((from_date)::date - '0001-01-01bc')::integer) ;
issues.suggestion: Remove the Constriant from the table definition

issues.reason: Issue with Partition using Expression on a table which cannot contain Primary Key / Unique Key on any column
issues.sqlStatement:
CREATE TABLE sales (
	cust_id bigint NOT NULL,
	name varchar(40),
	store_id varchar(20) NOT NULL,
	bill_no bigint NOT NULL,
	bill_date timestamp NOT NULL,
	amount decimal(8,2) NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY (bill_date)
) PARTITION BY RANGE (extract(year from date(bill_date))) ;
issues.suggestion: Remove the Constriant from the table definition

issues.reason: cannot use "list" partition strategy with more than one column
issues.sqlStatement:
CREATE TABLE test_1 (
	id numeric NOT NULL,
	country_code varchar(3),
	record_type varchar(5),
	descriptions varchar(50),
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
) PARTITION BY LIST (country_code, record_type) ;
issues.suggestion: Make it a single column partition by list or choose other supported Partitioning methods

issues.reason: cannot use "list" partition strategy with more than one column
issues.suggestion: Make it a single column partition by list or choose other supported Partitioning methods

issues.reason: cannot use "list" partition strategy with more than one column
issues.suggestion: Make it a single column partition by list or choose other supported Partitioning methods

issues.reason: insufficient columns in the PRIMARY KEY constraint definition in CREATE TABLE
issues.sqlStatement:
CREATE TABLE test_5 (
	id numeric NOT NULL,
	country_code varchar(3),
	record_type varchar(5),
	descriptions varchar(50),
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
) PARTITION BY RANGE (country_code, record_type) ;
issues.suggestion: Add all Partition columns to Primary Key

issues.reason: insufficient columns in the PRIMARY KEY constraint definition in CREATE TABLE
issues.sqlStatement:
CREATE TABLE test_6 (
	id numeric NOT NULL,
	country_code varchar(3),
	record_type varchar(5),
	descriptions varchar(50),
	PRIMARY KEY (id,country_code)
) PARTITION BY RANGE (country_code, record_type) ;
issues.suggestion: Add all Partition columns to Primary Key

issues.reason: insufficient columns in the PRIMARY KEY constraint definition in CREATE TABLE
issues.sqlStatement:
CREATE TABLE test_7 (
	id numeric NOT NULL,
	country_code varchar(3),
	record_type varchar(5),
	descriptions varchar(50),
	PRIMARY KEY (id,country_code)
) PARTITION BY RANGE (descriptions, record_type) ;
issues.suggestion: Add all Partition columns to Primary Key

issues.reason: insufficient columns in the PRIMARY KEY constraint definition in CREATE TABLE
issues.sqlStatement:
CREATE TABLE test_8 (
	order_id bigint NOT NULL,
	order_date timestamp,
	order_mode varchar(8),
	customer_id integer,
	order_mode smallint,
	order_total double precision,
	sales_rep_id integer,
	promotion_id integer,
	PRIMARY KEY (order_id,order_mode,customer_id,order_total,sales_rep_id)
) PARTITION BY RANGE (promotion_id, order_date, sales_rep_id) ;
issues.suggestion: Add all Partition columns to Primary Key

issues.reason: REINDEX is not supported.
issues.sqlStatement: REINDEX TABLE my_table;

issues.reason: Stored generated column is not supported. Column is: id
LIKE clause not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement:
CREATE TABLE table_xyz
  (LIKE xyz INCLUDING DEFAULTS INCLUDING CONSTRAINTS);

issues.reason: LIKE ALL is not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement:
CREATE TABLE table_abc
  (LIKE abc INCLUDING ALL);

issues.reason: INHERITS not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement: CREATE TABLE table_1 () INHERITS (xyz);

issues.reason: OIDs are not supported for user tables.
issues.sqlStatement: Create table table_test (col1 text, col2 int) with (OIDS = TRUE);

issues.reason: PRIMARY KEY containing column of type 'INTERVAL' not yet supported.
ALTER TABLE SET SCHEMA not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement: ALTER TABLE oldschema.tbl_name SET SCHEMA newschema;

issues.reason: ALTER TABLE ALTER column SET STATISTICS not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement: alter table table_name alter column column_name set statistics 100;

issues.reason: ALTER TABLE ALTER column SET STORAGE not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement: alter table test alter column col set STORAGE EXTERNAL;

issues.reason: ALTER TABLE ALTER column SET (attribute = value) not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement: alter table test_1 alter column col1 set (attribute_option=value);

issues.reason: ALTER TABLE ALTER CONSTRAINT not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement: ALTER TABLE address ALTER CONSTRAINT zipchk CHECK (char_length(zipcode) = 6);

issues.reason: ALTER TABLE SET WITH OIDS not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement: ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS test_2 SET WITH OIDS;

issues.reason: ALTER TABLE CLUSTER not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement: alter table abc cluster on xyz;

issues.reason: ALTER TABLE SET WITHOUT CLUSTER not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement: alter table test SET WITHOUT CLUSTER;

issues.reason: ALTER TABLE INHERIT not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement: alter table test_3 INHERIT test_2;

issues.reason: ALTER TABLE VALIDATE CONSTRAINT not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement: ALTER TABLE distributors VALIDATE CONSTRAINT distfk;

issues.reason: DEFERRABLE unique constraints are not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement:
ALTER TABLE abc
ADD CONSTRAINT cnstr_id
 UNIQUE (id)
DEFERRABLE;

issues.reason: Adding primary key to a partitioned table is not yet implemented.
issues.sqlStatement: ALTER TABLE xyz add PRIMARY KEY pk(id);

issues.reason: AnyData datatype doesn't have a mapping in YugabyteDB
issues.suggestion: Remove the column with AnyData datatype or change it to a relevant supported datatype

issues.reason: AnyDataSet datatype doesn't have a mapping in YugabyteDB
issues.suggestion: Remove the column with AnyDataSet datatype or change it to a relevant supported datatype

issues.reason: AnyType datatype doesn't have a mapping in YugabyteDB
issues.suggestion: Remove the column with AnyType datatype or change it to a relevant supported datatype

issues.reason: URIType datatype doesn't have a mapping in YugabyteDB
issues.suggestion: Remove the column with URIType datatype or change it to a relevant supported datatype

issues.reason: ALTER TABLE OF not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement: Alter table only party_profile_part of parent_tbl add constraint party_profile_pk primary key (party_profile_id);

issues.reason: Primary key constraints are not supported on foreign tables.
Foreign key constraints are not supported on foreign tables.
DROP multiple objects not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement: DROP INDEX idx1,idx2,idx3;
issues.suggestion: DROP INDEX idx1;DROP INDEX idx2;DROP INDEX idx3;

issues.reason: DROP INDEX CONCURRENTLY not supported yet
issues.sqlStatement: DROP INDEX CONCURRENTLY sales_quantity_index;

issues.reason: Schema contains gist index which is not supported.
issues.sqlStatement: CREATE INDEX film_fulltext_idx ON public.film USING gist (fulltext);

issues.reason: index method 'spgist' not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement: CREATE INDEX idx_name1 ON table_name USING spgist (col1);

issues.reason: index method 'rtree' is superceded by 'gist' which is not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement: CREATE INDEX idx_name2 ON table_name USING rtree (col1);

issues.reason: Schema contains gin index on multi column which is not supported.
issues.sqlStatement: CREATE INDEX idx_name3 ON schema_name.table_name USING gin (col1,col2,col3);

issues.reason: CREATE ACCESS METHOD is not supported.
issues.sqlStatement: CREATE ACCESS METHOD heptree TYPE INDEX HANDLER heptree_handler;

issues.reason: ALTER INDEX SET not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement: ALTER INDEX abc set TABLESPACE new_tbl;

issues.reason: temporary table is not a supported clause for drop
issues.suggestion: remove "temporary" and change it to "drop table"

issues.reason: JSON_ARRAYAGG() function is not available in YugabyteDB
issues.suggestion: Rename the function to YugabyteDB's equivalent JSON_AGG()

issues.reason: Schema containing VIEW WITH CHECK OPTION is not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement:
CREATE VIEW v1 AS SELECT * FROM t1 WHERE a < 2
WITH CHECK OPTION;

issues.reason: DROP multiple objects not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS view1,view2,view3;
issues.suggestion: DROP VIEW view1;DROP VIEW view2;DROP VIEW view3;

issues.reason: ALTER VIEW not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement: ALTER VIEW view_name TO select * from test;

issues.reason: JSON_ARRAYAGG() function is not available in YugabyteDB
issues.suggestion: Rename the function to YugabyteDB's equivalent JSON_AGG()

issues.reason: REFERENCING clause (transition tables) not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement:
CREATE TRIGGER transfer_insert
    AFTER INSERT ON transfer
    REFERENCING NEW TABLE AS inserted
    FOR EACH STATEMENT
    EXECUTE FUNCTION check_transfer_balances_to_zero();

issues.reason: CREATE CONSTRAINT TRIGGER not supported yet.
issues.sqlStatement:
CREATE CONSTRAINT TRIGGER some_trig
   AFTER DELETE ON xyz_schema.abc
   DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED
   FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE xyz_schema.some_trig();

issues.reason: JSON_ARRAYAGG() function is not available in YugabyteDB
issues.suggestion: Rename the function to YugabyteDB's equivalent JSON_AGG()

issues.reason: Compound Triggers are not supported in YugabyteDB.
